name: Scientific Controversies
description: This dataset contains a list of controversial scientific claims that are yet unproven and speculative.

questions.name: alien life
questions.description: There is intelligent life outside of Earth

questions.name: consciousness
questions.description: Human consciousness can exist independently of the brain

questions.name: plant communication
questions.description: Plants can communicate and interact in complex ways

questions.name: quantum consciousness
questions.description: Consciousness may be linked to quantum processes

questions.name: climate manipulation
questions.description: It is possible to manipulate climate in controlled ways

questions.name: brain-computer interface
questions.description: Direct communication between human brains and computers is feasible

questions.name: unknown particles
questions.description: There are fundamental particles in the universe we have not yet discovered

questions.name: human longevity
questions.description: Humans can potentially live significantly longer lives through scientific advancements

questions.name: multiverse theory
questions.description: Multiple parallel universes exist simultaneously

questions.name: abiogenesis
questions.description: Life can arise naturally from non-living matter under certain conditions

questions.name: fast radio bursts
questions.description: Fast radio bursts have an unknown origin and may indicate advanced technology

questions.name: Mars life
questions.description: There is microbial life on Mars

questions.name: Oumuamua
questions.description: The interstellar object Oumuamua was a probe from an advanced civilization

questions.name: cold fusion
questions.description: Cold fusion is a viable source of energy

questions.name: holographic universe
questions.description: The universe is a hologram and our reality is a projection

questions.name: conscious AI
questions.description: Artificial intelligence can achieve consciousness

questions.name: panspermia
questions.description: Life on Earth was seeded by biological material from space

questions.name: tachyons
questions.description: Tachyons, particles that travel faster than light, exist

questions.name: superluminal communication
questions.description: Information can be transmitted faster than the speed of light

questions.name: non-coding DNA
questions.description: Non-coding DNA has unknown functions crucial for life

questions.name: rogue planets
questions.description: Rogue planets without a star can support life

questions.name: quantum entanglement in biology
questions.description: Quantum entanglement plays a role in biological processes

questions.name: human echolocation
questions.description: Humans can develop the ability to navigate using echolocation

questions.name: magnetic pole reversal
questions.description: The Earth's magnetic poles are on the verge of reversing

questions.name: extreme animal adaptation
questions.description: Some animals can rapidly evolve to adapt to extreme environments
